summary:
Then when they talked of marrying within the week, I began to ask about father, but they
 both said never to mind about father, but just to tell him afterwards, and mother said
 she would make it all right with him. He would not go to the police and
 he would not go to you, and so at last as he would do nothing and kept on saying that
 there was no harm done, it made me mad, and I just on with my things and came right away
 to you.
